submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, integer_list: List[int], desired_value: int) -> int:
        
        array_size = len(integer_list)
        total_subarray_count = 0
        previous_results_dict = defaultdict(int)
        
        for idx in range(array_size):
            #print("idc :",idx)
            #print("prd ;" ,previous_results_dict )
            current_results_dict = defaultdict(int)
            
            if integer_list[idx] == desired_value:
                total_subarray_count += 1
            
            current_results_dict[integer_list[idx]] = 1
            
            #print("crd :" ,current_results_dict)
            
            for val, freq in previous_results_dict.items():
                new_and_result = val & integer_list[idx]
                #print("val :" , val)
                #print("freq :" , freq)
                #print(new_and_result)
                if new_and_result == desired_value:
                    total_subarray_count += freq
                current_results_dict[new_and_result] += freq
            
            previous_results_dict = current_results_dict
        
        return total_subarray_count
